00046             function                store_404_error_message( $Options )
00047             {
00048                   try
00049                   {
00050                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00051                         $ErrorLog = get_package( 'error_log::error_log_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );

00053                               5 , '404' , '{lang:page_was_not_found} '.$Security->get_srv( 'REQUEST_URI' , 'string' )

00055                   }

00080             function                delete_error( $Options )
00081             {
00082                   try
00083                   {
00084                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00085                         $ErrorLogAccess = get_package( 'error_log::error_log_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00086                         
00087                         $Ids = $Security->get_global( '_id_' , 'integer' , POST | PREFIX_NAME | KEYS );
00088                         foreach( $Ids as $k => $id )
00089                         {
00090                               $ErrorLogAccess->delete_error_log( $id );
00091                         }
00092                   }
00093                   catch( Exception $e )
00094                   {
00095                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00096                   }

00117             function                controller( $Options )
00118             {
00119                   try
00120                   {
00121                         $Context = get_package( 'gui::context' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00122                         
00123                         $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_404' );
00124                         if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return;
00125                         
00126                         $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_massive_delete' );
00127                         if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return;
00128                   }
